items.title: Crash Course in Project Management (PMP- Preperatory)
items.headline: Fundamentals of Project management introducing 10 Knowledge area, 49 Processes as per Global PMI PMBOK (PMP)Standards
objectives_summary: Terminologies, guidelines and best practices which are accepted globally in Project Management.
10 Important aspects (Knowledge area) of Project Management which is Scope, Time, Cost, Quality, Resource, Communication, Risk, Procurement, Stakeholder and Integration.
49 Processes as per the global standards set by PMI.

items.title: PMI-ACP Certification: Agile Project Management Essentials
items.headline: Agile Certified Practitioner Certification Program (PMI-ACP) - Course 1 of 8 - Agile Project Management Essentials
objectives_summary: understand characteristics of agile project management, distinguish between primary and secondary agile values, recognize agile principles, recognize the differences between defined and empirical methodologies, and compare the agile triangle of constraints with that of traditional project management.

compare the phases of traditional project management with those of the agile framework , understand how a project manager's responsibilities will change on an agile project, and distinguish between common agile methodologies.
